thread.section_title: Mabel's Labels Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mabel's Labels | mabelslabels.com | 3 of 141
thread.title: Corie

author: Corie
title: Corie
text: I love all there products. I have purchased 3 items from Mabels Labels and they have never disappointed me. I use the labels on my kids sippy cups and lunch containers for daycare. In the 4 years I've used them they have never come off their containers even after I put them through the dishwasher everyday. I will also be buying more labels for when my daughter starts school.
